授業目的: This course prepares students for undertaking research leading to the completion of thesis writing requirements in the final year.
到達目標: Students will learn the methods of doing independent research. They will also start reading and doing preliminary writing on topics related to their graduation thesis.

トピック.授業計画1: The content of this course will be tailored according to student interests.
トピック.授業外学習2: The readings of this course will be assigned according to student interests.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.

name: 【300】Research Seminar I　５／Research Seminar I [EN]
担当者: ツー　ティモシー（TSU TIMOTHY YUN HUI）
